医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
越南主动脉瓣狭窄患者 TAVR 结局的年龄比较宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。越来越多患有严重主动脉瓣狭窄的老年患者接受经导管主动脉瓣置换术（TAVR），与年轻人相比，引起了人们对其临床结果的担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Age-based-comparison-of-TAVR-outcomes-in-Vietnamese-病人-with-aortic-stenosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Age-based-comparison-of-TAVR-outcomes-in-Vietnamese-病人-with-aortic-stenosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae787e3d-305e-4b5d-92b0-4c16c2353c1e Tue, 05 Mar 2024 11:05:47 -0500
再保险计划可能会增加 ACA 市场参与者的成本匹兹堡大学公立学院卫生政策研究人员的一项研究表明，再保险计划旨在帮助降低保费并增加《平价医疗法案》健康保险市场的注册人数，但可能对许多潜在的市场参与者产生相反的影响健康、杜克大学和明尼苏达大学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Reinsurance-programs-may-increase-costs-for-ACA-marketplace-enrollees.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Reinsurance-programs-may-increase-costs-for-ACA-marketplace-enrollees.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6094dc1d-a357-468c-abe7-e40b0dcda576 Tue, 05 Mar 2024 10:56:46 -0500 Reinsurance programs may increase costs for ACA marketplace enrollees
Sacituzumab govitecan 联合铂类化疗对多种癌症有效2024 年 2 月 22 日，Oncotarget 第 15 卷发表了一篇新的研究论文，题为“Sacituzumab govitecan 联合铂类化疗介导对三阴性乳腺癌、膀胱癌和小细胞肺癌的显着抗肿瘤作用”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Sacituzumab-govitecan-plus-platinum-based-chemotherapy- effective-in-multiple-carcinomas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Sacituzumab-govitecan-plus-platinum-based-chemotherapy- effective-in-multiple-carcinomas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d628143-b40d-4ba3-bb17-0dd603547727 Tue, 05 Mar 2024 10:46:44 -0500 Sacituzumab govitecan plus platinum-based chemotherapy effective in multiple carcinomas
产妇肥胖和肥胖合并其他危险因素与死产风险增加相关CMAJ 最近的一项研究比较了两个类别的肥胖母亲的死产风险。一个人仅将肥胖作为危险因素，而另一个人则有未确诊的或其他影响怀孕的高风险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Maternal-obesity-and-obesity-with-other-risk-factors-are-linked-with-an-increased-risk-of-stillbirth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Maternal-obesity-and-obesity-with-other-risk-factors-are-linked-with-an-increased-risk-of-stillbirth.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e39becf-e498-40dc-be36-cf1240a5b89c Tue, 05 Mar 2024 09:00:00 -0500 Maternal obesity and obesity with other risk factors are associated with an increased risk of stillbirth
国际委员会审查有关蓝光暴露对健康影响的相互矛盾的证据多年来，科学家们一直对过度暴露于短波长光（SWL）（包括智能手机、笔记本电脑和平板电脑的“蓝光”）潜在的不利健康影响表示担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/International-commission-examines-conflicting-evidence-on-health-effects-of-blue-light-exposure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/International-commission-examines-conflicting-evidence-on-health-effects-of-blue-light-exposure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ee36a06-aa3d-41ac-9ebb-5073600e2132 Tue, 05 Mar 2024 07:57:05 -0500 International commission examines conflicting evidence on health effects of blue light exposure
举报人指控美国最大的独立初级保健网络 Aledade 医疗保险欺诈马里兰州一家负责监管全国最大的独立初级保健医疗网络的公司正面临举报人诉讼，指控该公司使用“操纵”计费软件使患者病情看起来比实际情况更严重，从而欺骗了医疗保险数百万美元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Whistleblower-accuses-Aledade-largest-US-independent-primary-care-network-of-Medicare-fraud.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Whistleblower-accuses-Aledade-largest-US-independent-primary-care-network-of-Medicare-fraud.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=086645ed-f247-4380-bb55-dd0e03d7af7f Tue, 05 Mar 2024 07:17:31 -0500 Whistleblower accuses Aledade, largest US independent primary care network, of Medicare fraud
统计模型与一线工作人员：谁最了解如何使用阿片类药物结算现金？在这座墨西哥湾沿岸城市，成瘾医学医生斯蒂芬·劳埃德 (Stephen Loyd) 在 1 月份的一次活动中宣布，州和地方政府将花费数十亿美元用于阿片类药物结算基金，他称之为“游戏规则改变者”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Statistical-models-vs-front-line-workers-Who-knows-best-how-to-spend-opioid-settlement-cash.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Statistical-models-vs-front-line-workers-Who-knows-best-how-to-spend-opioid-settlement-cash.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c3c4045-c219-4839-9a19-f33e1c76428b Tue, 05 Mar 2024 07:15:46 -0500 Statistical models vs. front-line workers: Who knows best how to spend opioid settlement cash?
FDA 批准贝克曼库尔特生命科学 DxFLEX 流式细胞仪https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/FDA-Clears-Beckman-Coulter-Life-Sciences-DxFLEX-Flow-Cytometer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/FDA-Clears-Beckman-Coulter-Life-Sciences-DxFLEX-Flow-Cytometer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18b2a1f9-f23b-4d1a-9530-1fb2895867fb Tue, 05 Mar 2024 06:48:00 -0500 FDA Clears Beckman Coulter Life Sciences DxFLEX Flow Cytometer
Exonate 一流滴眼液 Ib/IIa 期试验数据证明治疗糖尿病视网膜病变和糖尿病黄斑水肿的安全性和生物活性EXN407 是第一个外用 SRPK1 抑制剂，作为这些适应症的单一疗法，既具有安全性，又具有生物反应信号。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Exonate-first-in-class-eye-drop-Phase-IbIIa-trial-data-demonstrate-safety-and-biological-activity-in-treatment-糖尿病视网膜病变和糖尿病黄斑水肿.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Exonate-first-in-class-eye-drop-Phase-IbIIa-trial-data-demonstrate-safety-and-biological-activity-in-treatment-糖尿病视网膜病变和糖尿病黄斑水肿.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=409a32fd-9776-4db6-9724-6d6a9dae92b1 Tue, 05 Mar 2024 04:50:00 -0500 Exonate first-in-class eye drop Phase Ib/IIa trial data demonstrate safety and biological activity in treatment of diabetic retinopathy and diabetic macular oedema
随着越来越多的孩子采用绿色饮食，研究敦促谨慎行事并制定指导方针研究人员强调了高收入国家儿童植物性饮食的兴起，探讨了健康结果，并敦促制定统一的饮食指南，以减轻营养缺乏和生长问题等风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Study-urges-caution-and-guidelines-as-more-kids-go-green-with-diets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Study-urges-caution-and-guidelines-as-more-kids-go-green-with-diets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30d58665-2769-4b8a-81ed-8edcff3ee511 Mon, 04 Mar 2024 23:20:00 -0500 Study urges caution and guidelines as more kids go green with diets
